Kansas_City.Southmoreland:
Southmoreland is a neighborhood located in Kansas City, Missouri bordered by 39th Street on the north, Rockhill and Gillham Road on the east, Emanuel Cleaver II Boulevard on the south and Main Street on the west.
It is home to the Kansas City Art Institute, The Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art, The Kemper Museum of Contemporary Art, Rockhill Manor, a very busy Quik Trip and many artists.


== History ==

The Southmoreland neighborhood was established in the late 19th century as an elite neighborhood of businessmen from Kansas City, Missouri.
